Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Collars
Price: 3.95

How to Measure your Dog for a Leather Collar
Wrap a tape measure around your dog's neck
Place two fingers under the tape flat against dog's neck
Wrap the tape measure snugly
Add 1 inch for small dogs and 2 inches for medium to large dogs
  • Made from heavy-duty nylon and overlaid with beautifully hand painted leather

entry.title: cuteNfuzzy Easy Feed Small Pet Hanging Hay Bag for Guinea Pigs and Rabbits
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Small Animal Supplies
Price: 18.95

CuteNfuzzy's line of small pet hay feeders first premiered in 2019 and were meticulously designed and tested here in the USA. We're proud to have created a line of attractive, high-quality, innovative, long-lasting, and best-selling hay feeders designed for use with any small animal such as guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas, degus, and even reptiles such as tortoises! These bags are designed for easy, hassle-free, waste-free, and mess-free hay feeding. Unlike traditional wooden, plastic, or metal hay feeders that are intrusive, heavy, hard to fill, and can become dangerous for your pet, our feeders are completely safe and easy to use.

Each of our small pet hay bags features a pair of high-quality stainless steel trigger snaps that make hanging this bag a breeze, as well as a d-ring on the back so you can anchor the bag to your cage wall to prevent your pet from moving or flipping it. Our bags also have a full velcro closing top to prevent hay spillage. You'll love how much less hay is wasted and how much cleaner your pet's cage stays with our hay bags! Our feeders were designed to be as hygienic as possible by keeping your hay dry and unsoiled. These bags are also easy to clean and feature a waterproof inner lining. All of the seams on these bags are sturdily reinforced for maximum longevity.

Small animals have teeth that never stop growing, so they need to constantly chew in order to keep their teeth from becoming overgrown. Some pets are heavier chewers than others, and while most will not chew fabric, some pets may shred, rip, or eat fabric. For the pets who do this, we do not recommend the use of a fabric hay bag for them as they could try to ingest the fabric. Please take your pet’s individual personality, needs, and safety into consideration when choosing a hay feeder for them. We recommend keeping your hay bag full and not letting it become empty for lengths of time in order to lessen the risk of them eating the fabric. If your hay bag becomes damaged, immediately discontinue using it.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR PETS SAFETY IN MIND - this hay bag features an all-fabric durable nylon web design with 1.25" x 2" openings for increased safety, comfort for your pet, and durability. Our hay bags were proudly designed in the USA and tested extensively.
  • PERFECT FOR GUINEA PIGS, RABBITS, CHINCHILLAS, AND MORE - these hay bags were designed for use with a wide variety of hay eating small animals. Our hay bags are sized to hold a generous amount of hay, and are safe for every day and long-term use.
  • NOT DESIGNED FOR HEAVY CHEWERS - some small pets will chew/eat fabric. For these pets, we recommend that you do not use a fabric hay feeder as they may try to ingest the fabric. Always monitor your pet and remove the hay bag if it becomes damaged.
  • EXCLUSIVE SUPER TOUGH BOTTOM DESIGN - originally designed for horses, this bottom is more durable and keeps hay fresher by providing better air flow and allowing dust to exit your pet's hay. This also makes accessing the hay easier for your pet.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this hay pouch is available in two sizes: Small (10" long x 11" tall x 3” wide) and Large (15" long x 11" tall x 3” wide), and the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, and Dark Purple to best suit you and your pet's needs!

entry.title: CuteNfuzzy Leather Rolled Dog Martingale
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Collars
Price: 6.95

This strong, soft, and comfortable choke collar made of high quality genuine rounded leather is easy to put on and take off for everyday dog walks. The easy sliding design is used to adjust pressure for squirmy pets or pets with a tendency to pull. Heavy Duty stitching for lasting quality and metal D-rings for attaching identification tags and a leash. The rolled leather design prevents the development of tangled and matted fur. This is an excellent choice for everyday use. For a proper fit, using a measuring tape measure the circumference of your dog's neck and then add 2".

  • Adjustable for a custom fit on your dog or room to grow for your puppy
  • Heavy duty stitching and metal d-rings
  • Great for training or everyday use
  • Strong, soft and comfortable choke collar made of genuine rolled leather
  • Rolled leather design helps prevent the development of hair mats

entry.title: Derby Originals Ultra Flex Plush Microfiber Dog Bathrobe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 24.95

 

Derby Originals Ultra Flex Plush Microfiber Dog Bathrobe is designed with your pet’s comfort in mind. Our premium bathrobe is made of an ultra-high-quality, plush, soft to the touch, and absorbent microfiber material that instantly wicks away excess water and is comfortable for your dog to wear. Unlike other inferior dog bathrobes made of rough materials, our design won’t irritate or mat up your dog’s fur and produces a quick-drying effect. Our bathrobes are also the first robe on the market to feature an expandable shoulder gusset to ensure your dog has complete and total freedom of movement while wearing this bathrobe. Our bathrobes are available in four sizes, Small, Medium, Large, and X-Large to fit dogs of most sizes.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR DOG’S COMFORT IN MIND - our deluxe dog bathrobe is made of only the highest quality and plushest microfiber and features an easy on/off design and expandable shoulder gusset for increased comfort.
  • GREAT FOR BATHING, GROOMING, OR RAINY DAYS - our dog bathrobes are great for drying your pet off after a bath or swim, keeping them clean and comfortable after being groomed, or for warming up/drying your pet off after a walk.
  • MADE FROM HIGH-QUALITY ABSORBENT MICROFIBER - our dog bathrobes feature a solid microfiber construction that is extremely soft to the touch and is designed to wick away and absorb the maximum amount of excess water from your dog’s coat.
  • FEATURING A SHOULDER GUSSET FOR FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT - Other bathrobes can leave your dog feeling constrained. Our deluxe bathrobe is the only one on the market to feature an expandable shoulder gusset to allow your dog to walk/move freely.
  • UNIQUE BELLY-DRYING BELT DESIGN - our dog bathrobe features a tieable microfiber belt that is wider in the middle so that you can easily cover and dry your dog’s underside and prevent water from dripping off your dog’s belly.

Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Collars
Price: 9.95

Stand out from the crowd with this stylish and unique ostrich print dog collar. Made with premium USA leather accented with Swarovski crystals.

How to Measure your Dog for a Leather Collar
Wrap a tape measure around your dog's neck 
Place two fingers under the tape flat against dog's neck
Wrap the tape measure snugly
Add 1 inch for small dogs and 2 inches for medium to large dogs

CuteNfuzzy's line of small pet hay feeders first premiered in 2019 and were meticulously designed and tested here in the USA. We're proud to have created a line of attractive, high-quality, innovative, long-lasting, and best-selling hay feeders designed for use with any small animal such as guinea pigs, rabbits, chinchillas, degus, and even reptiles such as tortoises! These bags are designed for easy, hassle-free, waste-free, and mess-free hay feeding. Unlike traditional wooden, plastic, or metal hay feeders that are intrusive, heavy, hard to fill, and can become dangerous for your pet, our feeders are completely safe and easy to use.

Each of our small pet hay bags features a pair of high-quality stainless steel trigger snaps that make hanging this bag a breeze, as well as a d-ring on the back so you can anchor the bag to your cage wall to prevent your pet from moving or flipping it. Our bags also have a full velcro closing top to prevent hay spillage. You'll love how much less hay is wasted and how much cleaner your pet's cage stays with our hay bags! Our feeders were designed to be as hygienic as possible by keeping your hay dry and unsoiled. These bags are also easy to clean and feature a waterproof inner lining. All of the seams on these bags are sturdily reinforced for maximum longevity.

Small animals have teeth that never stop growing, so they need to constantly chew in order to keep their teeth from becoming overgrown. Some pets are heavier chewers than others, and while most will not chew fabric, some pets may shred, rip, or eat fabric. For the pets who do this, we do not recommend the use of a fabric hay bag for them as they could try to ingest the fabric. Please take your pet’s individual personality, needs, and safety into consideration when choosing a hay feeder for them. We recommend keeping your hay bag full and not letting it become empty for lengths of time in order to lessen the risk of them eating the fabric. If your hay bag becomes damaged, immediately discontinue using it.

  • MEASURES 15" LONG x 15" TALL x 5" WIDE - this hay bag is sized to fit inside most large cages and comfortably accommodate 1-3 small pets. This feeder features three front 2.5" diameter circular openings to allow up to three animals to eat at once.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND PATTERNS - our fun and colorful small pet hay feeders are available in the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, Purple, Green, and Rainbow Geometry so that you can find the perfect bag to match your pet's cage.

  • PERFECT FOR GUINEA PIGS, RABBITS, CHINCHILLAS, AND MORE - these hay bags were designed for use with a wide variety of hay eating small animals. Our hay bags are sized to hold a generous amount of hay, and are safe for every day and long-term use.
  • NOT DESIGNED FOR HEAVY CHEWERS - some small pets will chew/eat fabric. For these pets, we recommend that you do not use a fabric hay feeder as they may try to ingest the fabric. Always monitor your pet and remove the hay bag if it becomes damaged.
  • MEASURES 18" LONG x 11" TALL x 1.5" WIDE - this hay bag is sized to perfectly fit inside most cages and comfortably accommodate 1-4 small pets. This feeder features four front 1.75" wide by 3.75" tall openings to allow up to four animals to eat at once.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS AND PATTERNS - our fun and colorful small pet hay feeders are available in the colors Black, Hurricane Blue, Pink, Purple, Green, and Rainbow Geometry so that you can find the perfect bag to match your pet's cage.

entry.title: CuteNfuzzy Premium Hand Tooled Gaucho Leather Padded Dog Pulling Harness - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: cuteNfuzzy
Type: Harnesses
Price: 41.95 - 44.95 (4 variants)

If you’re looking for a sturdy and practical all-leather dog harness that is also incredibly beautiful and sure to make a statement on your next walk, our new Premium Tooled Gaucho Leather Padded Dog Pulling Harnesses are perfect for you. These premium multi-layer padded leather harnesses are a great fashion accessory/everyday harness for dogs such as American Pit Bull Terriers, English Bulldogs, Boxers, American Staffordshire Terriers, Cane Corsos, Bull Terriers, and other bully breeds and medium to giant dog breeds. These harnesses are supremely intricate and are hand-made with only the highest quality materials for a superior feel and fit that is unparalleled. These harnesses are ideal for those who are looking for something a step above everyday nylon dog harnesses, want a more fashionable harness to show off their dog’s beauty, or are looking for a wider, padded harness to prevent pressure points and pinching.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR DOG’S COMFORT IN MIND - this harness features soft rubbed edges and padding on the chest and back areas to prevent fur damage. The design of this harness helps eliminate pressure points

BUILT BULLY TOUGH - our premium gaucho leather harnesses are designed with bully breeds in mind and feature an extra tough and durable design with reinforced stitching, double layered leather, and super tough premium nickel hardware.

DECORATED WITH ORNATE HAND-TOOLING - these premium leather dog harnesses feature elegant leather tooling in two patterns, Basket Weave and Floral. Our harnesses are made and expertly tooled by hand by skilled leather craftsmen.

AVAILABLE IN FOUR SIZES - our premium padded dog harnesses are adjustable and available in the sizes Small, Medium, Large, and X-Large. These harnesses are designed to fit almost any breed and size of dog. Please see our size chart for measurements and sizing details.

AVAILABLE IN TWO STYLES - these harnesses are available in two styles, an all-black Basket Weave tooled design and a natural tan Floral design with contrasting charcoal leather inside the tooled areas.

entry.title: Derby Originals Adjust-to-Fit Horse-Tough Reflective 600D Waterproof Ripstop Nylon Winter Dog Coat 150g Polyfil with One Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 24.99 - 36.99 (35 variants)

Our Best Selling Design, Now New and Improved

We’ve taken our highest rated, best selling dog coat and made it even better by adding additional premium features such as two adjust-to-fit neck straps, which allows you to tailor the neck opening of this coat to fit your dog. This means you’ll now be able to get the best fit possible and prevent rain or snow from getting beneath your dog’s coat. We’ve also taken safety to the next level by adding a full band of reflective trim around the coat, so that your dog is highly visible at night or on walks. For maximum safety, try out our Safety Orange coat which was designed to protect your dog during hunting season.


Built Horse Tough

Derby Originals is a world class producer of durable, high quality horse blankets, and we carried that same strength, durability, and longevity over into our dog blankets. We took the features that make our horse blankets great, and put those in our dog coats. Features such as easy on/off and adjustable chest buckles, secure double hook & loop belly closures, removable elastic leg straps, soft no-rub linings, ripstop materials, and reinforced stitching are just some of the many features our blankets offer! All of these combined features make for a comfortable fitting, non-restrictive, long-lasting dog coat that truly is Built Horse Tough, but tailored to perfectly fit your dog!


210T Nylon No Rub Lining

This blanket contains a nylon No Rub 210T inner lining, which is made of a sleek, super silky and soft nylon fabric that was designed to help polish and protect your dog’s hair coat without damaging it. Unlike other materials, our soft 210T lining prevents and won’t cause rubbing, sore spots, and fur damage. Instead, this soft lining will help keep your dog’s fur coat looking shiny and healthy, while preventing hair damage, tangles, mats, and other common issues that can arise from friction and pressure on your dog's fur.

 

Product Features

BUILT FOR A HORSE, BUT TAILORED FOR YOUR DOG - our classic and best selling dog coats have been a customer favorite for years due to their horse-strong design with premium features like shoulder gussets and a double hook & loop closures.

NEW PREMIUM FEATURES - we’ve taken our best selling coat and made it even better by adding a pair of neck adjustments to allow you to get the most accurate fit for your dog, and adding reflective trim around the body of this coat to promote your dog’s safety on walks and hikes.

WATERPROOF DESIGN - this dog coat has a completely waterproof (but still breathable!) exterior and was designed to keep your canine companion warm and dry in even the worst weather conditions.

AN OPTION FOR EVERY DOG - this dog coat is one of the most versatile on the market, having a plethora of color and size options to suit every breed, size, and life stage of dog, and every pet parent’s taste!

NOT JUST A DOG COAT - this dog coat was designed to be versatile in size so that it can be used as a coat for a plethora of animals from goats to horses (our coats are ideal for mini horses and foals!).

 

For more details about the warranty, please visit the manufacturer Derby Originals website. Registration must be done online on manufacturer's website within 15 days of purchase or the warranty will be voided.

 

Product Specifications

Outer Material: 600D Nylon

Inner Material: 210T Nylon

Filling: Polyfil

Fill Weight: 150g

Ripstop: Yes

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Leg Straps: No

Size Options: 8”, 10”, 13.5”, 17.5”, 22”, 26.5”, and 28.5”

Color Options: Royal Blue, Orange, Turquoise, Purple, and Black

Machine Washable: Yes

Reflective: Yes

Warranty: One Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty, see details at https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/royal-international-warranty

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium Reflective Hydro Cooling Swamp Jacket with Adjustable Belly Band & Harness Compatible Opening
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Dog Coats & Blankets
Price: 26.99 - 35.99 (6 variants)

Derby Originals innovative and new Premium Hydro Cooling Jacket is the perfect solution for keeping your pet safe and happy in harsh summer weather. These jackets keep your dog dry, but naturally cooled using the power of evaporation, for up to 10 or more hours! This premium version also features a new cooling belly band that is designed to be highly adjustable to fit more sizes and breeds of dogs, while also helping to keep your dogs belly and internal organs from overheating. These jackets are a perfect choice for those who want to take their dog on long walks or hikes, participate in dog sports, or simply keep their dog cool and safe from harmful UV rays. These coats were designed to help prevent potentially fatal heat stroke in dogs, and instead, keep your pup comfortable and happy in hot weather.

Before the first use, please dunk the product under water, gently squeeze out the excess water and let the product dry completely. This is necessary for the cooling fibers to set into the product. Please note, the product could feel 'soapy' because of the polyester fiber migration after the first activation. This rinses away on the next soaking.

NEW AND IMPROVED DESIGN - this premium version of our hydro cooling jacket has been designed with a cooling belly band that makes this coat more adjustable and effective than ever before. This new version also has reflective trim for added safety and visibility. This dog coat has a special opening feature that makes it compatible with harnesses and leashes.

PROTECTS AGAINST UV RAYS - these coats not only protects against heat but harmful UV rays from the sun as well. If you’re looking for UV protection that won’t add bulk and overheat your dog, these coats are perfect for you.

DESIGNED TO PREVENT OVERHEATING - these coats are great for longer haired, double-coated, or brachycephalic breeds who are prone to overheating, heat stress, and heat exhaustion. Keeping your dog cool with this coat could potentially save their life!

LIGHTWEIGHT THREE-LAYER DESIGN - this jacket is made of a three-layer, ultra-thin, quilted material. The outer layer reflects heat and evaporates water, the middle layer absorbs and retains water, and the inner layer repels water.

SOOTHES SORE MUSCLES AND JOINTS - another benefit of this cooling jacket is that it can be used to cool and soothe sore joints and muscles or relieve arthritis pain in your dog. The powerful cooling action of this coat acts like an ice pack and provides instant cooling relief.

entry.title: Derby Dog Designer Series USA Leather Padded Bully Dog Collar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Collars
Price: 18.95 - 26.95 (10 variants)

Derby Originals’ Designer Series features leather dog collars made with high-grade USA sourced leather from Wickett & Craig of Pennsylvania. This leather was designed to remain smooth, crack-free, and supple for many years. These collars are available in a wide range of sizes, styles, and colors so that you can find the collar that best fits you and your dog’s needs. Also found in our Designer Series is a collection of attractive, matching leashes made from USA leather in complementary styles and a variety of thicknesses and lengths.

The beautifully studded rounded metal enhancing is equipped with rust-proof nickel-plated hardware. This ensures it will look nice and new for a long period of time as it is being used.

This designer collar comes in 9 different sizes for different breeds or animals. Extra Small (8”) is perfect for Teacup breeds, Puppies, Kittens and or Cats. Small (10”-12”) best matches to Yorkies, Chihuahuas, and Mini Dachshunds. Medium (14”-16”) can be used for Jack Russells, Shelties, Pugs, Cocker Spaniels and adolescent Goats. Large (18”-20”) best fits Labradors, Dalmatians, Rottweilers, and Collies. Extra Large (22”-24”) works for Great Danes, German Shepherds, Saint Bernards, Bernese Mt. Dogs, and Goats.

Features

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this leather dog collar by Derby Originals was designed to last with features such as durable stitching, and featuring high-grade leather that will last for years to come if cared for properly.

MULTIPLE SIZES AVAILABLE - this leather collar is available in 9 different sizes designed to fit multiple different types of dog breeds. We offer sizes: XS- 8”, S- 10”-12”, M- 14” -16”, L -18” -20”, and XL- 22” - 24”.

PADDED FOR MAX COMFORT - this collar relieves pressure points on dogs who pull hard on leads and leashes, and has a firm but thick and durable texture for long-term wear.

ROUNDED METAL ENHANCEMENTS - the metal spots convey all the toughness with none of the safety worries of a spiked collar.

USA LEATHER - this dog collar is made with high-grade, supple, USA sourced leather from Wickett & Craig of Pennsylvania. This leather was designed to remain smooth, crack-free, and supple for many years.
